name: A Political Marriage (Demo)
description:
Play as one of two princesses (with choice of pronouns) and use all your cunning, pigheadedness, and moxie to bring about the end of the war and the beginning of your marriage.

Currently only tested for Chrome as the final release will be an electron app.

Demo content is subject to change in the final release, which will be coming in 2020!

This game is built in Twine, and the custom VN system will be released with the full game.

If you run into any issues, email Leah at leahthecase@gmail.com
